trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EmfPlusRecordType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of metafile record.
trans-unit.target: Membro da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EmfPlusRecordType" /> que especifica o tipo de registro de metarquivo.

trans-unit.source: Set of flags that specify attributes of the record.
trans-unit.target: Conjunto de sinalizadores que especifica os atributos do registro.

trans-unit.source: Number of bytes in the record data.
trans-unit.target: Número de bytes nos dados de registro.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a buffer that contains the record data.
trans-unit.target: Ponteiro para um buffer que contém os dados de registro.

trans-unit.source: Provides a callback method for the <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um método de retorno de chamada para o método <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile" />.

trans-unit.source: Return <see langword="true" /> if you want to continue enumerating records; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorne <see langword="true" /> se desejar continuar enumerando registros; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado em conjunto com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A> método o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: Certain overloads of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A> method call an application-defined callback method of this type for each record in a specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: Determinadas sobrecargas do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A> método chamar um método de retorno de chamada definido pelo aplicativo desse tipo para cada registro de metarquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The callback function can display each record (or selected records) by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: A função de retorno de chamada pode exibir cada registro (ou registros selecionados) ao chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> método o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> que está sendo enumerada.

trans-unit.source: A user declaration of this callback method must have the same parameters as the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc> delegate declaration.
trans-unit.target: Uma declaração de usuário deste método de retorno de chamada deve ter os mesmos parâmetros que o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc> delegar a declaração.
